roleset.name: to refrain from or deduct, holding back

example.name: all arguments
example.text: Prices closed mostly higher in relatively light trading as farmers continued to withhold their crops from the marketplace in the hope of higher prices to come .

propbank.arg: in the hope of higher prices to come

example.name: arg1
example.text: The option as voluntary will at least not require quotas and enforcement through violent means -LRB- beatings -RRB- or witholding of priveledges like food , bedding -LRB- yes bedding -RRB- or outdoor sunlight and isolation . -LRB- legislativ brutality encouragement -RRB-

propbank.arg: of priveledges like food , bedding -LRB- yes bedding -RRB- or outdoor sunlight

roleset.note: HOLD-V NOTES: Added based on THYME.
WITHHOLD-V NOTES: Frames file for 'withhold' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from withhold.01-v predicate notes)
WITHHOLDING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, withhold.01. No VNcls. (from withholding.01-n)
